results.title: The Last of Us
results.plot: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.
results.stars: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Anna Torv, Lamar Johnson

results.title: The Mandalorian
results.plot: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
results.stars: Pedro Pascal, Carl Weathers, Chris Bartlett, Leilani Shiu

results.title: Attack on Titan
results.plot: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.
results.stars: Josh Grelle, Yûki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue

results.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
results.plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
results.stars: Daniel Kwan, Daniel Scheinert, Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ke Huy Quan

results.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem

results.plot: An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.
results.stars: Scott Beck, Bryan Woods, Adam Driver, Ariana Greenblatt, Chloe Coleman, Nika King

results.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
results.plot: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, along with Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, explore the Quantum Realm, where they interact with strange creatures and embark on an adventure that goes beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.
results.stars: Peyton Reed, Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Douglas, Michelle Pfeiffer

results.title: Star Trek: Picard
results.plot: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard in the next chapter of his life.
results.stars: Patrick Stewart, Michelle Hurd, Jeri Ryan, Alison Pill

results.title: Game of Thrones
results.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
results.stars: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington, Lena Headey

results.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
results.plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.
results.stars: James Cameron, Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

results.title: True Lies
results.plot: An unfulfilled suburban housewife is shocked to discover that her bland and unremarkable computer consultant husband is a skilled international spy.
results.stars: Ginger Gonzaga, Erica Hernandez, Steve Howey, Annabella Didion

results.title: The Flash
results.plot: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.
results.stars: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker, Carlos Valdes

results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Swordsmith Village
results.plot: All the Upper Rank Demons assemble at the Infinity Castle after Upper Six Demons' defeat.
results.stars: Haruo Sotozaki, Zach Aguilar, Laila Berzins, Kira Buckland, Reba Buhr

results.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
results.plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
results.stars: Ryan Coogler, Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Winston Duke

results.title: Star Wars: The Bad Batch
results.plot: The 'Bad Batch' of elite and experimental clones make their way through an ever-changing galaxy in the immediate aftermath of the Clone Wars.
results.stars: Ming-Na Wen, Dee Bradley Baker, Michelle Ang, Noshir Dalal

results.title: Andor
results.plot: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One'. In an era filled with danger, deception and intrigue, Cassian will embark on the path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.
results.stars: Diego Luna, Kyle Soller, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O'Reilly

results.title: House of the Dragon
results.plot: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.
results.stars: Rhys Ifans, Matt Smith, Fabien Frankel, Graham McTavish

results.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
results.plot: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.
results.stars: David F. Sandberg, Grace Caroline Currey, Zachary Levi, Helen Mirren, Rachel Zegler

results.title: The Hunger Games
results.plot: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.
results.stars: Gary Ross, Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Stanley Tucci

results.title: Shadow and Bone
results.plot: Dark forces conspire against orphan mapmaker Alina Starkov when she unleashes an extraordinary power that could change the fate of her war-torn world.
results.stars: Jessie Mei Li, Ben Barnes, Archie Renaux, Freddy Carter

results.title: Vikings
results.plot: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.
results.stars: Katheryn Winnick, Gustaf Skarsgård, Alexander Ludwig, Georgia Hirst

results.title: The Book of Boba Fett
results.plot: Bounty hunter Boba Fett and mercenary Fennec Shand navigate the underworld when they return to Tatooine to claim Jabba the Hutt's old turf.
results.stars: Temuera Morrison, Ming-Na Wen, Frank Trigg, Collin Hymes

results.title: R.I.P.D.
results.plot: A cop killed by his own partner joins RIPD, an afterlife law enforcement department working to apprehend various monsters disguised as humans living on earth, and gets paired up with a smart-mouthed veteran.
results.stars: Robert Schwentke, Ryan Reynolds, Jeff Bridges, Mary-Louise Parker, Kevin Bacon

results.title: Wrong Side of the Tracks
results.plot: When his teenage granddaughter falls victim to the drug dealers overtaking his neighborhood, a fed-up war veteran takes matters into his own hands.
results.stars: Jose Coronado, Nona Sobo, Felipe Londoño, Laura Ramos

results.title: The Last of Us
results.plot: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.
results.stars: Neil Druckmann, Bruce Straley, Troy Baker, Ashley Johnson, Hana Hayes, Jeffrey Pierce

results.title: One Piece
results.plot: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".
results.stars: Mayumi Tanaka, Laurent Vernin, Tony Beck, Akemi Okamura

results.title: Plane
results.plot: A pilot finds himself caught in a war zone after he's forced to land his commercial aircraft during a terrible storm.
results.stars: Jean-François Richet, Gerard Butler, Mike Colter, Tony Goldwyn, Yoson An

results.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
results.plot: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers sets off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.
results.stars: Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes, LeVar Burton

results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
results.plot: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.
results.stars: Natsuki Hanae, Zach Aguilar, Abby Trott, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

results.title: Vinland Saga
results.plot: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.
results.stars: Yûto Uemura, Mike Haimoto, Alejandro Saab, Kaiji Tang

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
results.plot: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.
results.stars: Morfydd Clark, Ismael Cruz Cordova, Charlie Vickers, Markella Kavenagh

results.title: The Winchesters
results.plot: An epic untold love story of John and Mary of how they not only saved their love but also the entire world.
results.stars: Meg Donnelly, Drake Rodger, Nida Khurshid, Jojo Fleites

results.title: Magnum P.I.
results.plot: An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.
results.stars: Jay Hernandez, Perdita Weeks, Zachary Knighton, Stephen Hill

results.title: RRR
results.plot: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.
results.stars: S.S. Rajamouli, N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Ram Charan, Ajay Devgn, Alia Bhatt

results.title: The Witcher
results.plot: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
results.stars: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra, Mimi Ndiweni

results.title: Star Trek: Discovery
results.plot: Ten years before Kirk, Spock, and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.
results.stars: Sonequa Martin-Green, Doug Jones, Anthony Rapp, Emily Coutts

results.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
results.plot: A prequel to Star Trek: The Original Series, the show will follow the crew of the USS Enterprise under Captain Christopher Pike.
results.stars: Melissa Navia, Anson Mount, Ethan Peck, Jess Bush

results.title: The Recruit
results.plot: Follows a lawyer at the CIA who gets entangled in dangerous international power politics when a former asset threatens to expose the nature of her long-term relationship with the agency.
results.stars: Noah Centineo, Fivel Stewart, Laura Haddock, Aarti Mann

results.title: My Hero Academia
results.plot: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.
results.stars: Daiki Yamashita, Justin Briner, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ayane Sakura

results.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
results.plot: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.
results.stars: Francis Lawrence, Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Philip Seymour Hoffman

results.title: S.W.A.T.
results.plot: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.
results.stars: Shemar Moore, Alex Russell, Kenny Johnson, Jay Harrington

results.title: Dune
results.plot: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.
results.stars: Denis Villeneuve, Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Zendaya, Oscar Isaac

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
results.stars: Peter Jackson, Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean

results.title: The Mummy
results.plot: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.
results.stars: Stephen Sommers, Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo

results.title: Lockwood & Co
results.plot: A tiny startup, run by two teenage boys and a newly arrived, supremely psychically gifted girl, a renegade trio destined to unravel a mystery that will change the course of history.
results.stars: Ruby Stokes, Cameron Chapman, Ali Hadji-Heshmati, Jack Bandeira
